QuestData.Title: The Might of Three
QuestData.Description: This is it, $n. This is the end.$B$BIf we don't drive the mogu from the valley, they will seize the remnants of their ancient power and use it to break Pandaria to their will.$B$BBut our forces are few, and tired, and small. We bleed, while their warriors are made of stone.$B$B$n, although all odds are against us, still I must ask you to go and help our forces slay the mogu invaders.$B$BI have prayed to the Celestials, begging their aid. I can only hope that they answer our call.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 100 mogu invaders at the Summer Fields in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
